UnitDefinition.Name: PBK model parameter distribution types.
UnitDefinition.Description: Probability distribution types for PBK model parameters.

Unit.Name: LogNormal
Unit.Description: Lognormal distribution parameterised by a mean and two coefficients of variation (CVs), one representing variability around the mean and the other reprenting uncertainty of the mean.

Unit.Name: Normal
Unit.Description: Normal distribution parameterised by a mean and two standard deviations (SDs), one representing variability around the mean and the other reprenting uncertainty of the mean.

Unit.Name: Logistic Normal
Unit.Description: Logistic Normal distribution parameterised by a mean and two coefficients of variation (CVs), one representing variability around the mean and the other reprenting uncertainty of the mean.
